query:
INSERT INTO task_comments (id, task_id, author_id, author_name, author_email, content, is_internal, created_at, updated_at)
               VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, datetime('now', 'subsec'), datetime('now', 'subsec'))
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         task_id as "task_id!: Uuid",
                         author_id as "author_id: Uuid",
                         author_name,
                         author_email,
                         content,
                         is_internal as "is_internal!: bool",
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
